# motionStartBorderMode

**Instance Property**

Configures the behavior when the ray-tracing system samples the acceleration structure before the motion start time.

## Declaration

```swift
var motionStartBorderMode: MTLMotionBorderMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to control the behavior when the ray-tracing system samples the acceleration structure at a time prior to the one you set for [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4PrimitiveAccelerationStructureDescriptor/motionStartTime].

The default value of this property is `MTLMotionBorderModeClamp`.
